cna.analysis

Class CoverageAnalysis

  • java.lang.Object
    • cna.analysis.CoverageAnalysis

  • public class CoverageAnalysis
extends java.lang.Object
    Provides functionality to analyze coverage data of alignments and create coverage plots
    Author:
    Stefan Grabuschnig

    • Constructor Detail

      • CoverageAnalysis

        public CoverageAnalysis()

    • Method Detail

      • evaluateGenomeCoverage

        public static void evaluateGenomeCoverage(java.util.ArrayList<Alignment> alignments,
                                          double threshold,
                                          int minSize)
        evaluates and prints coverage parameters for the average coverage of a set of alignments. Distinguishes between covered und uncovered (noisy) regions based on a threshold
        Parameters:
        alignments - list of alignments
        threshold - threshold for coverage interpretation
        minSize - minimum size for a region classified as covered

      • evaluateRegionSizes

        public static void evaluateRegionSizes(java.util.ArrayList<Alignment> alignments,
                                       double threshold,
                                       int minSize,
                                       int maxSize)
        Creates a histogram of the sizes of region classified as covered (average coverage of alignments)
        Parameters:
        alignments - list of alignments
        threshold - threshold for coverage interpretation
        minSize - minimum size for a region classified as covered
        maxSize - maximum size for a region classified as covered (sets the scope of the histogram)

      • evaluateRegionSizesForRepeatFamilies

        public static void evaluateRegionSizesForRepeatFamilies(java.util.LinkedList<java.lang.String> repeatFamilies,
                                                        java.util.ArrayList<Alignment> alignments,
                                                        double threshold,
                                                        int minSize,
                                                        int maxSize)
        Creates histograms for the sizes of regions classified as covered (average coverage of alignments) belonging to specified repeat families (one histogram per family)
        Parameters:
        repeatFamilies - names of the considered repeat families
        alignments - list of alignments
        threshold - threshold for coverage interpretation
        minSize - minimum size for a region classified as covered
        maxSize - maximum size for a region classified as covered (sets the scope of the histogram)

      • getSortedRegions

        public static java.util.HashMap<java.lang.String,java.util.ArrayList<Region>> getSortedRegions(java.util.ArrayList<Alignment> alignments,
                                                                                               double threshold,
                                                                                               int minSize,
                                                                                               int maxSize)
        Parameters:
        alignments - list of alignments
        threshold - threshold for coverage interpretation
        minSize - minSize minimum size for a region classified as covered
        maxSize - maximum size for a region classified as covered
        Returns:
        a hashmap of regions interpreted as covered (average coverage of alignments) assigned to repeat families, non repetitive regions, or mixed (multiple repeat families).

      • evaluateSortedRegions

        public static void evaluateSortedRegions(java.util.ArrayList<Alignment> alignments,
                                         double threshold,
                                         int minSize,
                                         int maxSize)
        Creates a figure of histograms for the sizes of regions interpreted as covered (average coverage of alignments) belonging to full length intact L1 repeats, L1 repeats, centr repeats and simple repeats
        Parameters:
        alignments - list of alignments
        threshold - threshold for coverage interpretation
        minSize - minimum size for a region classified as covered
        maxSize - maximum size for a region classified as covered (scope of histograms)

      • plotRegion

        public static org.jfree.chart.JFreeChart plotRegion(java.lang.String chromosome,
                                                    int start,
                                                    int stop,
                                                    java.util.ArrayList<Alignment> alignments)
        Parameters:
        chromosome - name of the chromosome
        start - start coordinate of the region
        stop - stop coordinate of the region
        alignments - list of alignments
        Returns:
        a JFreeChart of a coverage plot for the normalized average coverage of the specified region

      • plotAll

        public static void plotAll(java.util.ArrayList<Region> regions,
                           java.util.ArrayList<Alignment> alignments)
        batch coverage plot for a set of regions
        Parameters:
        regions - list of regions
        alignments - list of alignments
